description:
One helmet to rule the road. if you're looking for a lightweight road helmet that you can commute with Monday to Friday and take to the weekend club rides, the Omne Air might just be your helmet. Based in Sweden, POC has been making cutting edge personal safety equipment for snowsports and cycling for nearly two decades.

  • MIPS Integra (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) reduces rotational forces in an oblique impact. The Integra system uses moving pads instead of a moving inner liner. These pads provide the same level of protection as a standard MIPS liner, but take up less space and allows for more ventilation
  • Forward-facing vents offer a secure place to store your glasses when you don't need them
  • Internal air channels reduce drag and maximize cooling
  • Adjustable fit system lets you dial in your perfect fit
  • Extended protection wraps around the base of the skull
  • Lightweight straps are easy to adjust, and super comfy
  • The white and bright orange colourway is part of POC’s Attention, Visibility, Interaction, and Protection (AVIP) initiative, designed to maximize cyclist visibility
name: POC Omne Air MIPS Helmet - Unisex
